long_description: With a massive 1,200-lumen beam to light the way and a 2 hr. runtime to outlast commutes or evening trail sessions, the CatEye Volt 1200 Bike Light offers excellent visibility for riding in the dark. 5 different lighting modes (high, normal, low, hyper constant, flashing) let you adjust your lighting needs on the go. Runs up to 2 hrs. (high); 5 hrs. (normal); 17.5 hrs. (low); 14.5 hrs. (Hyper Constant) and 100 hrs. (flashing). Beam is optimized for straight-ahead visibility, but lens also emits light sideways to enhance safety. Low battery indicator light lets you know when it's time to charge up the battery with the included micro USB cable; charge time is 8 - 14 hrs. Includes handlebar mount and charging cable.
short_description: With a massive 1,200-lumen beam to light the way and a 2 hr. runtime to outlast commutes or evening trail sessions, the CatEye Volt 1200 Bike Light offers excellent visibility for riding in the dark.
